short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides tools to organize and sort tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Sorter is a simple extension that helps keep your tabs in order.  It can sort your tabs within the window and can collect all tabs from a site into a new window.

Version 1.3: Reliably sort on first click
